statements: SELECT * FROM billing_information
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM billing_information WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT invoice_number, invoice_date FROM billing_information ORDER BY invoice_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM billing_information WHERE total_amount > 1000
SELECT customer_name FROM billing_information WHERE invoice_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28'
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM billing_information WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT invoice_number, customer_name, total_amount FROM billing_information WHERE invoice_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing_information WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND invoice_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT invoice_number, invoice_date, total_amount FROM billing_information WHERE total_amount < 500 ORDER BY invoice_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_amount FROM billing_information WHERE customer_name LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT invoice_id, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE payment_status = 'Paid';
SELECT * FROM invoices ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS num_invoices FROM invoices GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_invoices > 3;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone = '+1234567890';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, invoice_date, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN invoices ON customers.customer_id = invoices.customer_id WHERE invoices.payment_status = 'PAID';
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN invoices ON customers.customer_id = invoices.customer_id WHERE invoice_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, invoice_date, total_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN invoices ON customers.customer_id = invoices.customer_id WHERE invoices.total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name AS Name, customer_email AS Email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT invoice_id, invoice_date, total_amount FROM invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY invoice_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount_paid < 500 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;

SELECT c.customer_name, i.invoice_date, p.amount_paid FROM customers c JOIN invoices i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id JOIN payments p ON i.invoice_id = p.invoice_id WHERE c.customer_id = 2 ORDER BY p.amount_paid DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT invoice_id, total_amount FROM invoices ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT invoice_id, product_name, quantity, price FROM invoice_items WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY invoice_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers;
SELECT invoice_id, total_amount, invoice_date FROM invoices WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM invoices JOIN customers ON invoices.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT invoice_id, SUM(amount_paid) AS total_paid FROM payments GROUP BY invoice_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT invoice_id, amount FROM invoices WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, quantity FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customers.customer_name, invoices.amount FROM customers JOIN invoices ON customers.customer_id = invoices.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
